Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes a real property tax exemption for veterans with a 100 percent service connected disability
Summary: Establishes a real property tax exemption for the primary residence of veterans with a 100 percent service connected disability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing a real property tax exemption for veterans who have a one hundred percent service connected disability
